text: Hanki Josua'ene Israeli vahe'mo'zama Jodani timofo zage ufre kaziga me'nea kumatamimpi kini vahe'ma ha'ma hu zamagaterete'za eri'naza mopa, Lebanoni agupoa Ba'al-Gatiti agafa huteno vuno Seiri kaziga avugosama hunte'nea Halaki agonare vu'ne. Hagi ana mopa Josua'a refko huno Israeli vahera nagate nofite hu'za erisantihare'za manisaza mopa zami'ne.
